1439960.name: The Doomed Knight
1439960.description:
You are the Doomed Knight. Torn between madness and sanity. You walked the realm of death for thousands of years forgot your own past and identity. But something is wrong in the realm of death. A boy in the world is not allowed to die! The cities of the dead are empty! Souls are being tortured and corrupted. And the black death is preparing something unspeakable! Together with your oldest advisor, the necromicon, the book of the dead, you are out to discover what it is. And maybe even your own past will be uncovered...

This metrodvania inspired game lets you discover an fascinating world full of monsters, secrets and mysteries.

The game offers you:

- 12 giant metroidvania areas
- multiple endings depending on your decisions and gameprogress
- 12 Endbosses and over 60 monsters and creatures
- huge arsenal of items, abilities and equippment
- over 60 souls/characters you can collect
- approximately 20 hours of gameplay
- unique and detailed artstyle
1439960.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 丹麦语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 日语, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 瑞典语, 泰语, 捷克语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 匈牙利语, 简体中文, 越南语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
